title: Bug 41074Output of tag "jsp:plugin" is not conform to XHTML.
description: Bug 41074Output of tag "jsp:plugin" is not conform to XHTML.
OB: The jsp comiler outputs all tag required for an object in upper case letters.To be conform with XHTML lower case is required, but all tags are hard coded inthe generator.
EB: The jsp comiler outputs all tag required for an object in upper case letters.To be conform with XHTML lower case is required, but all tags are hard coded inthe generator.
